usefulItems: 12-hole muffin tray, wooden skewer, muffin wrap papers, oven
title: Coffee date muffins

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Spray a 12-hole muffin tray with oil, then line with muffin wrap papers and set aside.
Place all remaining ingredients into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.

Divide mixture evenly between prepared muffin moulds and bake for 22 minutes (180°C) or until a wooden skewer inserted into the centre of the muffins comes out clean. Serve warm or allow to cool before serving.

hintsAndTricks: We recommend using good quality, soft dates in this recipe.
You can store these muffins in an air-tight container in the pantry for 2 days.
<b>Gluten free coffee date muffins<b>: replace the plain flour and baking powder with gluten free flour and gluten free baking powder.
